title: Marika-Chan No Koukando Wa Bukkowarete Iru
alternative_title: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている; Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak; Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.
status: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている; Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak; Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.
description:
Description :
        Ive gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.I dont have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chans meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?Marika-chan, you dont like me, so why are you so kind to me...?What is Marika-chans hidden truth behind her cute faade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?+
